detailsData.title: Comprehensive Approach
detailsData.content: Effective asset protection requires a comprehensive approach. This often includes an Asset Management Limited Partnership together with a carefully crafted Bridge Trust.

detailsData.title: Bridge Trust®
detailsData.content: The Bridge Trust® combines the strengths of offshore asset protection trusts while avoiding their weaknesses. It is domesticated for tax and administrative purposes.

detailsData.title: Customized Plans
detailsData.content: Each Integrated Asset Protection Plan is customized to our client's needs. Designed by experts at Lodmell & Lodmell, these legal structures are designed to preserve and protect your wealth.

detailsData.title: Experienced Team
detailsData.content: Since 1997, Lodmell & Lodmell has helped to protect and preserve the assets and wealth of thousands of clients nationwide. Our team has extensive experience in asset protection.

valueProp: Asset Protection works by removing the economic incentive for a person, and that person’s attorney to pursue you in a court of law. The best way to protect your assets is to take legal steps to make you unattractive to potential predators.
